You can't let that one thing get you down. That guy 's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson .
